_meta.title: Career & Professional Growth 사업운/직업운
_meta.description: Strategic insights for career advancement, business success, and professional development

The Fool.career_meaning: A bold new career beginning. Take a leap into a new field, start a business, or embrace an unconventional path. Risk leads to reward.
The Fool.korean: 대담한 새로운 경력 시작. 새로운 분야로 뛰어들거나 사업을 시작하세요.
The Fool.job_seeker: Apply for positions outside your comfort zone. Unexpected opportunities await.
The Fool.employed: Consider a complete career change or innovative project. Think outside the box.
The Fool.business: Start that new venture. Your fresh perspective is your advantage.
The Fool.industries: Startups, innovation, travel, entertainment, unconventional fields
The Fool.advice: Don't let fear of the unknown stop you. The biggest career leaps require courage.

The Magician.career_meaning: You have all the skills needed for success. Time to showcase your abilities and take initiative. Manifest your career goals through focused action.
The Magician.korean: 성공에 필요한 모든 기술을 갖추고 있습니다. 능력을 보여주고 주도권을 잡을 시간입니다.
The Magician.job_seeker: Your interview skills are sharp. Present yourself confidently. You'll impress.
The Magician.employed: Take the lead on projects. Your initiative will be recognized and rewarded.
The Magician.business: You have everything needed to succeed. Execute your vision with confidence.
The Magician.timing: Career magic is possible now - act with intention
The Magician.advice: Stop doubting yourself. You have the power to create the career you want.

The High Priestess.career_meaning: Hidden opportunities exist. Trust your intuition about career moves. Behind-the-scenes knowledge gives you an advantage.
The High Priestess.korean: 숨겨진 기회가 존재합니다. 경력 이동에 대한 직감을 신뢰하세요.
The High Priestess.job_seeker: Hidden job opportunities exist. Network quietly. Trust gut feelings about companies.
The High Priestess.employed: Information is power. Observe before acting. Hidden dynamics affect your career.
The High Priestess.business: Research before launching. Market intelligence is crucial now.
The High Priestess.timing: Wait for more information before major career decisions
The High Priestess.industries: Research, psychology, counseling, investigation, esoteric fields
The High Priestess.advice: Listen to your intuition about career matters. The hidden path may be the right one.

The Empress.career_meaning: Creativity and abundance flow in your career. Nurture projects to fruition. Success through creative expression and care.
The Empress.korean: 창의성과 풍요가 경력에 흐릅니다. 프로젝트를 결실까지 육성하세요.
The Empress.job_seeker: Creative fields favor you. Look for nurturing work environments.
The Empress.employed: Your projects will flourish. Nurture team relationships. Creative expression valued.
The Empress.business: Growth is organic and steady. Nurture your business like a garden.
The Empress.timing: Projects planted now will yield abundant results
The Empress.industries: Arts, design, beauty, hospitality, healthcare, childcare, agriculture
The Empress.advice: Create, nurture, and let your work grow organically. Abundance follows care.

The Emperor.career_meaning: Authority, leadership, and structure. Time to take charge, build systems, and lead. Promotions and leadership opportunities arise.
The Emperor.korean: 권위, 리더십, 구조. 책임을 맡고, 시스템을 구축하고, 이끌 시간입니다.
The Emperor.job_seeker: Target leadership positions. Your organizational skills are needed.
The Emperor.employed: Promotion energy is strong. Step into leadership. Build lasting structures.
The Emperor.business: Establish strong systems and processes. Lead with authority and fairness.
The Emperor.industries: Management, construction, government, military, finance, executive roles
The Emperor.advice: Take charge of your career. Build something that will last.

The Hierophant.career_meaning: Traditional career paths, education, and mentorship. Learn from established institutions and respected mentors.
The Hierophant.korean: 전통적인 경력 경로, 교육, 멘토십. 확립된 기관과 존경받는 멘토로부터 배우세요.
The Hierophant.job_seeker: Look at established companies, traditional industries. Get certifications.
The Hierophant.employed: Seek mentorship. Follow established protocols. Education advances your career.
The Hierophant.business: Partner with established institutions. Credibility through traditional channels.
The Hierophant.timing: Good for educational pursuits, certifications, formal training
The Hierophant.industries: Education, religion, law, medicine, counseling, traditional institutions
The Hierophant.advice: Respect the wisdom of those who came before. Learn the rules before breaking them.

The Lovers.career_meaning: A major career choice that aligns with your values. Partnership opportunities. Work that you love.
The Lovers.korean: 가치관에 맞는 중요한 경력 선택. 파트너십 기회. 사랑하는 일.
The Lovers.job_seeker: Choose a position that aligns with your core values, not just money.
The Lovers.employed: A significant career choice approaches. Business partnerships highlighted.
The Lovers.business: Partnership offers arrive. Choose collaborators who share your vision.
The Lovers.timing: Major career decision within weeks - choose with heart and head
The Lovers.industries: Any field where passion meets profession
The Lovers.advice: Choose work you love. A soul-aligned career brings success and fulfillment.

The Chariot.career_meaning: Victory through determination. Career advancement through focused drive. Overcome professional obstacles with willpower.
The Chariot.korean: 결단력을 통한 승리. 집중된 추진력으로 경력 발전. 의지력으로 전문적 장애물 극복.
The Chariot.job_seeker: Push forward aggressively. Your determination wins the position.
The Chariot.employed: Drive projects to completion. Overcome obstacles. Victory is within reach.
The Chariot.business: Competitive advantage through focused effort. Outwork the competition.
The Chariot.timing: Push hard now - career victory is close
The Chariot.industries: Sales, sports, transportation, military, competitive fields
The Chariot.advice: Take control of your career direction. Victory goes to the determined.

Strength.career_meaning: Success through patience and inner confidence. Handle workplace challenges with grace. Gentle persistence wins.
Strength.korean: 인내와 내면의 자신감을 통한 성공. 우아하게 직장 문제를 처리하세요.
Strength.job_seeker: Your calm confidence impresses. Persistence in job search pays off.
Strength.employed: Handle difficult colleagues or projects with patience. Your composure is noticed.
Strength.business: Steady, patient growth. Tame challenges with strategy, not force.
Strength.timing: Long-term career success through persistent effort
Strength.industries: Healthcare, animal care, counseling, management, any helping profession
Strength.advice: Career success comes through patience and inner strength, not aggression.

The Hermit.career_meaning: Specialized expertise and solitary work. Time for deep skill development. Consulting or independent work suits you.
The Hermit.korean: 전문화된 전문성과 독립적 작업. 깊은 기술 개발의 시간입니다.
The Hermit.job_seeker: Seek positions that allow independent work. Your expertise is valuable.
The Hermit.employed: Focus on deepening skills. Specialist roles suit you better than management.
The Hermit.business: Consulting, coaching, or solo entrepreneurship favored.
The Hermit.timing: Step back to develop expertise before advancing
The Hermit.industries: Research, consulting, writing, programming, analysis, any specialist field
The Hermit.advice: Develop deep expertise. The specialist is more valuable than the generalist.

Wheel of Fortune.career_meaning: Major career changes are fated. Lucky breaks and sudden shifts. Adaptability is key to success.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 주요 경력 변화가 운명되어 있습니다. 운 좋은 기회와 갑작스러운 변화.
Wheel of Fortune.job_seeker: A lucky break is coming. Be ready to seize unexpected opportunities.
Wheel of Fortune.employed: Major workplace changes. Reorganizations may benefit you. Stay adaptable.
Wheel of Fortune.business: Market shifts favor you. Pivot when opportunity appears.
Wheel of Fortune.industries: Fields experiencing major change - technology, media, emerging markets
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Fortune favors the prepared. Be ready when the wheel turns your way.

Justice.career_meaning: Fair treatment and ethical decisions in career. Legal matters, contracts, and just outcomes. Karma in business.
Justice.korean: 경력에서의 공정한 대우와 윤리적 결정. 법적 문제, 계약, 정당한 결과.
Justice.job_seeker: Fair hiring processes favor you. Negotiate contracts carefully.
Justice.employed: Workplace justice issues may arise. Ethical behavior rewarded.
Justice.business: Legal matters require attention. Fair dealing brings long-term success.
Justice.timing: Contract negotiations, legal matters, performance reviews
Justice.industries: Law, HR, compliance, government, advocacy, mediation
Justice.advice: Act with integrity. In business, as in life, the scales always balance.

The Hanged Man.career_meaning: Career pause or limbo. See your professional situation from a new angle. Sacrifice short-term gains for long-term growth.
The Hanged Man.korean: 경력 일시정지 또는 불확실함. 전문적 상황을 새로운 각도에서 보세요.
The Hanged Man.job_seeker: The job search may stall. Use this time for reflection and skill-building.
The Hanged Man.employed: Career feels stuck. Surrender old approaches. A new perspective is needed.
The Hanged Man.business: Pause before major decisions. What seems like delay brings insight.
The Hanged Man.timing: Not the time to push - wait for clarity
The Hanged Man.advice: Sometimes the best career move is to stop and see things differently.

Death.career_meaning: Major career transformation. End of one professional chapter, beginning of another. Let go of what's not working.
Death.korean: 주요 경력 변화. 한 전문적 장이 끝나고 다른 장이 시작됩니다.
Death.job_seeker: Your old career identity is dying. Embrace complete reinvention.
Death.employed: Major role or company changes. Layoffs may lead to better opportunities.
Death.business: Pivot or close what's not working. Transformation is necessary.
Death.industries: Career transitions, industry shifts, complete reinvention
Death.advice: Let the old career die gracefully. Something better is being born.

Temperance.career_meaning: Balance and patience in career growth. Blend skills, find work-life harmony. Steady, integrated progress.
Temperance.korean: 경력 성장에서의 균형과 인내. 기술을 조합하고 일과 삶의 조화를 찾으세요.
Temperance.job_seeker: Look for roles that offer balance. Don't rush the process.
Temperance.employed: Find work-life balance. Blend different skills and roles effectively.
Temperance.business: Grow steadily rather than explosively. Integration over expansion.
Temperance.timing: Patience yields best career results - don't rush
Temperance.industries: Health, wellness, mediation, integration, project management
Temperance.advice: Career success is a marathon, not a sprint. Find balance and blend your gifts.

The Devil.career_meaning: Examine what keeps you trapped in your career. Unhealthy work dynamics, burnout, or golden handcuffs. Liberation is possible.
The Devil.korean: 경력에서 당신을 가두는 것을 검토하세요. 건강하지 못한 업무 역학, 번아웃, 또는 황금 수갑.
The Devil.job_seeker: Don't take a job just for money. Avoid toxic workplaces.
The Devil.employed: Examine if you're trapped by salary, status, or fear. Break free if necessary.
The Devil.business: Address any unethical practices or unhealthy dependencies.
The Devil.timing: Face career shadows now - liberation follows
The Devil.industries: Warning about any field where you feel trapped
The Devil.advice: Don't sell your soul for a paycheck. Career freedom is possible.

The Tower.career_meaning: Sudden career disruption. Job loss, company collapse, or unexpected change. From destruction comes opportunity.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 경력 붕괴. 실직, 회사 붕괴, 또는 예상치 못한 변화.
The Tower.job_seeker: Old job expectations shatter. Be open to completely different paths.
The Tower.employed: Sudden changes - layoffs, restructuring, or revelation of truth.
The Tower.business: Business model may collapse. Rebuild on stronger foundations.
The Tower.timing: Sudden career changes - be prepared for disruption
The Tower.advice: When the tower falls, don't cling to the rubble. Build anew.

The Star.career_meaning: Hope and inspiration return to your career. Dream jobs become possible. Healing after professional setbacks.
The Star.korean: 희망과 영감이 경력으로 돌아옵니다. 꿈의 직업이 가능해집니다.
The Star.job_seeker: Your dream job is achievable. Stay hopeful and persistent.
The Star.employed: Renewed inspiration at work. Recognition of your unique gifts.
The Star.business: Vision and hope return. Inspire others with your mission.
The Star.timing: Career hopes manifest - stay faithful to your vision
The Star.industries: Creative fields, humanitarian work, innovation, healing professions
The Star.advice: Keep your career dreams alive. Hope opens doors that cynicism cannot.

The Moon.career_meaning: Career confusion or deception. Not all is as it seems at work. Trust intuition but verify facts.
The Moon.korean: 경력 혼란 또는 속임. 직장에서 모든 것이 보이는 대로가 아닙니다.
The Moon.job_seeker: Company may not be as presented. Research thoroughly. Trust your gut.
The Moon.employed: Workplace politics, hidden agendas, or confusion. Tread carefully.
The Moon.business: Market illusions. Verify assumptions before major decisions.
The Moon.timing: Wait for clarity before major career moves
The Moon.industries: Be cautious in any field until truth emerges
The Moon.advice: Navigate career matters with intuition. The truth will eventually emerge.

The Sun.career_meaning: Career success and recognition. Joy in your work. Everything becomes clear. Professional achievements shine.
The Sun.korean: 경력 성공과 인정. 일에서의 기쁨. 모든 것이 명확해집니다.
The Sun.job_seeker: Success! The right position comes with clarity and joy.
The Sun.employed: Recognition, promotions, and joy at work. Your achievements are visible.
The Sun.business: Business thrives. Public success and recognition.
The Sun.timing: Career success peaks - excellent for launches and visibility
The Sun.industries: Any field where you can shine publicly
The Sun.advice: Step into the spotlight. Your career success is well-deserved.

Judgement.career_meaning: Career calling and evaluation. Answer your professional purpose. Past work reviewed, leading to new opportunities.
Judgement.korean: 경력 부름과 평가. 전문적 목적에 응답하세요.
Judgement.job_seeker: A calling to your true profession. Past experience is valued.
Judgement.employed: Performance reviews favor you. Promotions based on past achievements.
Judgement.business: Answer your entrepreneurial calling. Past efforts now pay off.
Judgement.timing: Career reviews, evaluations, and significant decisions
Judgement.advice: Answer your career calling. Your past experience prepares you for this moment.

The World.career_meaning: Career completion and mastery. Major professional achievement. Ready for the next level. International opportunities.
The World.korean: 경력 완성과 숙달. 주요 전문적 성취. 다음 단계를 위한 준비.
The World.job_seeker: You've arrived. A significant career milestone is achieved.
The World.employed: Major career achievement completed. Ready for new challenges.
The World.business: Business reaches significant milestone. Expansion or completion.
The World.timing: Major career cycle completes - celebrate then prepare for what's next
The World.industries: International business, leadership, any field at mastery level
The World.advice: You've achieved career mastery. Celebrate, then set your sights on the next world.

business_specific.startup_phase: Wands indicate action and initiative. The Magician, Ace of Wands, and Chariot are especially favorable.
business_specific.growth_phase: Empress and Three of Pentacles support steady expansion and team building.
business_specific.pivot_decision: Death and Tower indicate necessary transformation. Trust the process.
business_specific.partnership: Two of Cups and Three of Pentacles favor collaboration. Justice ensures fair contracts.
